summary: Pizza is an Italian food made with a flat dough base, tomato sauce, cheese, and other toppings. It's cooked at high heat, often in a wood oven. The word "pizza" was first used around 1000 years ago in Italy. Neapolitan pizza is the most traditional kind and is even recognized by UNESCO. Pizza is super popular worldwide and can be found in many restaurants, or even made at home. It's a big business, with billions of dollars spent on pizza each year in the U.S. alone.
title: Pizza
